Noob Scroll

A lightweight jQuery Plugin that adds some cool function to make scrolling more fun.

/!\ We are still developping Noob Scroll

Made by @arthur_guiot

Simple

NoobScroll is design for noobs (just kidding üòÇ), that's why it's incredibly simple to use üòâ!

Lightweight

NoobScroll is complitely optimized for modern browser and is weight 1.29 kb minified!

Simply the best

NoobScroll is the only library that combines multiples useful functions about scrolling, but with the ease to use of jQuery.

Download v1.0

Get Started

To use noobscroll.js, you'll need to download noobscroll.js and add it in your js folder. And after, add these line of code in the head or in the body of your page:

Demo

Now, you can use Noob Scroll on your website like this, but we recommend you to read the docs
